title: Avalon Hill -- The Longest Day Board Game
description:
I don&#039;t know if anybody wants this.  A long time ago, back before the age of computers, we used to play games with little square cardboard counters on big rectangular boards.

This was the biggie -- it was 32 square feet of board space.  This is the game completely scanned including counters.

It&#039;s a great game, excellently detailed, and takes about 100 hours to play the campaign.  Get some coffee.

Enjoy!
